Third-party software

Since LCToolbox is mainly a wrapper for different software tools, you might want to download additional packages.

MATLAB's Robust Control Toolbox is a minimal requirement to be able to use LCToolbox.

YALMIP

YALMIP is required for solving SDPs with another solver than 'LMI Lab', which is a part of MATLAB's Robust Control Toolbox.

CasADi is required for optimization problems involving splines, and thus for all LPV features of LCToolbox.

OptiSpline is required for optimization problems involving splines, and thus for all LPV features of LCToolbox.

FrequencyDomainToolbox

The FrequencyDomainToolbox offers implementations of the frequency domain identification methods discussed in this book.

HIFOO

HIFOO is a non-smooth controller synthesis tool for synthesis without convexifications.

SDP solvers

The SDPs involved in linear controller synthesis can be solved by the set of SDP solvers that are supported by YALMIP.
